description.text: To the best of my knowledge, there are currently 7 eyes that are unattended by eye holders. The ones that can be found in structures include the Cursed and the Old. As for the others... I think most of them can be crafted with the life forces in our realm, while a few of them may have been stolen by sentient beasts. The locals around may know more about that than I do. However, I do know that the clerics are currently in possession of the Evil Eye.
I think there's no need to look for the eyes anymore?
